Issue.creator: giniz
Issue.summary: Failed to build docker image from local source with "make docker"
Issue.description: operator-dashboard start at / dir missing below lines at https://github.com/hyperledger/cello/blob/master/docker/user-dashboard/Dockerfile.in _COPY --from=build_login /usr/app/src/src/public/js/dist /usr/app/src/src/public/js/dist_ _COPY --from=build_home /usr/app/src/src/public/js/dist /usr/app/src/src/public/js/dist_ _COPY --from=build_dashboard /usr/app/src/src/public/js/dist /usr/app/src/src/public/js/dist_ --> user-dashboard start without _/usr/app/src/src/public/js/dist_ >
